As a avid CS player since 2005, CSGO has kept the thrill alive.  Constant updates and new skins being added help keep this game enjoyable.  My only complaint is the hacker detection system in place does not work very well.  I hope valve fixes this issue soon. running into several matches with hackers sometimes causes me to take extended breaks. Other than that, I highly recommend this game!
